$RAGON: THE PEPE OF JAPAN!

PINKSALE IS LIVE 🔥

CONTRACT ADDRESS (BEP-20):

A NEW ERA OF MEME TOKENS IS FINALLY HERE

WHAT'S GREEN, HAS GIANT LIPS AND ISN'T AN INU?

THAT'S RIGHT, THE JAPANESE VERSION OF PEPE— MEET $RAGON!

RAGON IS THE PEPE OF JAPANESE CULTURE AND IS ABOUT TO TAKE OVER CRYPTO MEME COINS. SOON EVERYONE WILL BE CREATING RAGON TOKENS. HERE IS WHY.

RAGON KAIJIN IS A CHARACTER FROM THE JAPANESE TELEVISION SERIES "ULTRAMAN." SHE FIRST APPEARED IN EPISODE 26 OF THE ORIGINAL "ULTRAMAN" SERIES, WHICH AIRED IN 1967. THAT'S 56 YEARS AGO! THAT MAKES RAGON A TRUE MEME MVP!

SHE IS A KAIJU, A TYPE OF GIANT MONSTER THAT FREQUENTLY APPEARS IN THE ULTRAMAN FRANCHISE. RAGON KAIJIN IS NOTABLE FOR HER GIANT LIPS AND ARMOR-LIKE GREEN SKIN. SHE HAS THE ABILITY TO SHOOT SUPER HEATED WATER FROM HER MOUTH.
